alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 3:56AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Snow showers with embedded snow squalls possible today across northern New York into Vermont... Snow showers with embedded snow squalls are possible between 11 AM and 5 PM today as a cold front moves across the region. Affected locations will see rapidly changing weather and road conditions, with brief heavy snow, gusty winds, and areas of blowing snow. Quick snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are possible. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in snow squalls, which can lead to temporary near whiteout conditions and the potential for dangerous driving conditions. Be prepared for snow covered roads, slow down, and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton
